## base namespace

| Abstract Class                                                           | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [AnyMockDescriptor](./case-example-mock-types.base.anymockdescriptor.md) | <p>The base class for all ContractCase Mock Descriptors.
